medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant and epigastric pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started six days ago, worsened progressively, was intermittent, and worsened with eating. It was associated with nausea and chills but no emesis. The patient had diarrhea on the last two days and also the morning of presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Reports an unclear abdominal surgery in the past.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has a history of leukemia, father is healthy.
